docs.text: Support ¶ CronOps DevOpsTip ¶ Please create a Github Issue . To get in touch please check CronOps website Contributing to CronOps DevOpsTips ¶ This document explains how to get start contributing to CronOps DevOpsTips . It includes how to build, test, and release new versions. Quick Start ¶ Getting the code ¶ The code must be checked out from this same github.com repo inside the CronOps Github Organization . git clone git@github.com:cronops-io/devopstips.cronops.io.git cd devopstips.cronops.io Initial developer environment build ¶ Follow README.md instructions Deploying ¶ Automated post PR approved and merged from your WIP branch. Testing ¶ Build must pass OK + proper manual content review Releasing ¶ CircleCi PR auto-release job ¶ https://circleci.com/gh/cronops-io/devopstips.cronops.io NOTE: Will only run after merged PR.
docs.title: Contributing

docs.text: Please create a Github Issue . To get in touch please check CronOps website

docs.text: Welcome ¶ Overview CronOps DevOps Tips show Product Management, Development, QA, IT Operations, and Information Security best practices and how they all integrate to contribute in both building and scaling high-performance technology organizations. The result of following our tips and shifting to a DevOps mindset and culture should be a world-class software delivery performance through optimized collaboration, communication, reliability, stability, scalability and security at ever lower cost and effort. Getting Started ¶ DevOpsTips Categories Discover our tips classified by DevOps Improvement capabilities categories directly associated to software delivery performance. See Cultural See Product and Process See Lean Management See Architecture See Development & CI/CD See Monitoring See Security
docs.title: Welcome
